#id=1
#text=After a long day , I decided to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I changed out of my clothes into a plush bathrobe .
#id=3
#text=I placed a plug in the tub drain so the tub could fill up .
#id=4
#text=I turned on the water and adjusted it so it was just the right temperature - hot , but not too hot .
#id=5
#text=I sprinkled in some lavender scented bath salts to make it extra relaxing .
#id=6
#text=It took about five minutes for the whole tub to fill up .
#id=7
#text=I did n't fill it all the way to the top .
#id=8
#text=I had to leave some room since I 'd be getting in .
#id=9
#text=When it was ready , I dipped my toe in first , testing out the water .
#text=I hung my robe on the back of the door , and got into the tub .
#text=I eased in slowly since the water was hot .
#text=I got nestled in to the water and washed myself with a washcloth and soap .
#text=Then I leaned my head against the rim of the bathtub .
#text=I breathed in the aroma of lavender , closed my eyes , and felt my body and mind completely relax .
